meaningMnemonic: Under your own <radical>roof</radical>, a <radical>geoduck</radical> jumps out of the <radical>ground</radical> with a <radical>sword</radical> and stabs your husband/wife/marriage partner to death. Now you're a <kanji>widow</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You may be a <kanji>widow</kanji>, but that doesn't make you weak. You run outside, jump into your <reading>ca</reading>r (か), and run your entire house and the geoduck over.
